## Goal -- recreate the Bash tool `head` in Python

### print n lines command line arg

### Intended Code
```{python, eval = FALSE}
import sys
filename = sys.argv[1]
n_lines = int(sys.argv[2])
for i, line in enumerate(open(filename)):
  if i < n_lines:
    print(line, end="")
```
